summary: The AI Industry Prosperity Index is significantly elevated due to aggressive hyperscaler Capex increases focused on AI infrastructure (Meta raised forecast to $35-40B, Google +50% YoY, Microsoft expanding AI capacity), stable/high GPU rental prices ($3.20/hr) indicating sustained demand exceeding supply, and upcoming major model releases (GPT-5 rumored for mid-2025, Gemini 2 expected late 2024).
